entry.title: Friday: Increasing cloudiness. High 18.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 18. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Friday 12 May 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Showers. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Showers beginning early this evening. Risk of a thundershower early this evening. Fog patches developing after midnight. Amount 5 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Friday 12 May 2023
